entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 then northeast 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
